__TOC__

This is the home of the Ubucon San Francisco, ie. Ubuntu Community Day at <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxworldexpo.com/live/12/|LinuxWorld]]</nowiki>.

When: Thursday, August 7, 10am - 4pm

Where: Room 131 (?), Moscone Center, San Francisco, CA

Who: All interested ubunteros and Ubuntu newbies

Other links: <nowiki>[[http://www.new.facebook.com/event.php?eid=34496197240|Facebook event page]]</nowiki>

== Ubuntu Community Day at LinuxWorld ==

There will be a one-day community event at <nowiki>[[http://www.linuxworldexpo.com/live/12/|LinuxWorld]]</nowiki> around the topic of Ubuntu. If you'd like to learn more about Ubuntu, or if you'd like to lead a tutorial, then <nowiki>[[https://register.rcsreg.com/regos-1.0/lnsf2008/ga/|register here]]</nowiki>.
